deleteDescription.en: Are you sure that you want to delete this contact?
deleteDescription.zh: 确定要删除这个联系方式吗?

emailInvalid.zh: 请输入合法格式的邮箱!

phoneTip.en: Currently, only 11-digit phone numbers with the +86 area code from mainland China are supported.
phoneTip.zh: 目前只支持中国大陆（+86区号）的11位电话号码

phoneInvalid.zh: 请输入合法格式的电话号码

noteInvalid.en: A note can support up to 150 characters.
